game_description: Live your dream of a boxing champion and conquer the ring. Push attack and defend to fully surprise your opponent. Amazing gameplay with outclass environment will make you feel the real experience of what it looks like to be a boxing master.
review_1: It’s really good but also needs more development in the punching, and maybe more stuff, overall it’s great but just needs more stuff added, and in the pictures added in the game looked fun but I guess you guys upgraded it but more bad
review_2: Best VR boxing game.i really enjoyed it.Brillian feature specially face hitting with fully force I like it very much
review_3: The actual boxing is pretty fun but I'm pretty sure there's only one opponent. Its challenging to knock him out but you can win by points and there is only one round. Replay value is in trying to knock him out which so far I only get him down to about 30% Price is high with the lack of content but it's a keeper if you just want to wail on someone in the ring it's not bad.
